Name: Hollow's Land
About the game: What kind of game is Hollow's Land? Hollow's Land is relaxing game where you kill skeletons of fire who are trying to put out your fire. The whole atmosphere is above the northern lights and around the fire. Gameplay Take a snowball and hit the heart of the skeleton Features Cozy atmosphere Pleasant music Northern Lights
